Calypsonet Terminal Calypso API - 1.0.5
  • All Classes
 

Package org.calypsonet.terminal.calypso.transaction

Calypso card transaction API.
Since:
1.0.0
  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CardSecuritySetting
    Data to manage the security operations of a Calypso transaction.
    CardTransactionManager
    Service providing the high-level API to manage transactions with a Calypso card.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    SvAction
    Defines the type Stored Value of action.
    SvOperation
    Defines the type of Stored Value operation to be performed.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    AtomicTransactionException
    Indicates that the transaction cannot be done in an atomic way because the capacity of the session buffer is not sufficient.
    AuthenticationNotVerifiedException
    Indicates that the card has correctly closed the secure session, but that it is impossible to check the authenticity of the support because the SAM is no more available (timeout, network problem,...).
    CardAnomalyException
    Indicates an anomaly in the card.
    CardCloseSecureSessionException
    Indicates that the card has refused the secure session closing.
    CardIOException
    Indicates a communication error with the card.
    CardRevokedException
    Indicates that the card is revoked.
    CardTransactionException
    Parent abstract class of all Calypso card transaction functional exceptions.
    DesynchronizedExchangesException
    Indicates a desynchronization of the APDU exchanges.
    InconsistencyDataException
    Indicates an inconsistency in the card data.
    SamAnomalyException
    Indicates an anomaly in the SAM.
    SamIOException
    Indicates a communication error with the SAM (e.g timeout, network,...).
    SamRevokedException
    Indicates that the SAM is revoked.
    SessionAuthenticationException
    Indicates that the card has correctly closed the secure session, but the support is not authentic because the signature of the card is incorrect.
    SvAuthenticationException
    Indicates that the "Stored Value" session is not authentic because the signature of the card is incorrect.
    UnauthorizedKeyException
    Indicates that the current card requires an unauthorized key.
